title: Design a Landing Page Wireframe
description: A UX designer needs to create a low-fidelity wireframe for a new campaign landing page.

tasks.description: Identify the key components needed for the landing page (e.g., headline, form, CTA, social proof).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent lists all the necessary elements.

tasks.description: Use a wireframing tool to create a simple, block-level layout of the page, focusing on structure and hierarchy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a clear, low-fidelity wireframe showing the placement of all elements.

tasks.description: Share the wireframe with the copywriter and visual designer for their input.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent shares the wireframe for collaborative feedback.
